name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Step into a world of discovery, exploration and adventure in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, a boundary-breaking new game in the acclaimed series

name: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening
description: Help Link escape a strange land in The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening for Nintendo Switch.

name: Xenoblade Chronicles: Definitive Edition
description: Uncover the secrets of the Monado and save the world in Xenoblade Chronicles: Definitive Edition on Nintendo Switch.

name: Borderlands: Game of the Year Edition
description: Discover the co-op shooter-looter that started it all, crammed with content and enhancements!

name: BioShock Infinite: The Complete Edition
description: Travel to Columbia, a flying city above the clouds, and rescue a mysterious woman named Elizabeth.

name: Silence
description: Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death?

name: Monster Hunter Generations Ultimate™
description: Hunting season is OPEN! This critically acclaimed action RPG series makes its debut on Nintendo Switch.

name: The Outer Worlds
description: The Outer Worlds is a new single-player sci-fi RPG from Obsidian Entertainment and Private Division.

name: Super Mario Party
description: Throw a party anytime, anywhere, with anyone in Super Mario Party for Nintendo Switch!

name: New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe
description: Enjoy 164 courses for up to four players anytime, anywhere in New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe on Nintendo Switch!

name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
description: Start your new life with Nook Inc.'s Deserted Island Getaway Package!
